channel.title: Few more problems
channel.description:
I have a few more problems.
A. How do I make a basic construction skill?
Reason:
I suck at programming, and I want my server to be at least a little original.
B. Since, of course, I'm admin on my server, I want it to say that when I use "::yell". I want it to say [Owner]Mod Klondike: SO AND SO.
And for admins, [Admin]Namehere: SO AND SO.
Mods: [Mod]Namehere: SOANDSO
Programmers/Hoster: [Staff]Namehere: SOANDSO.
C. [s]Whenever I try to add/Delete an object, it constantly gives me errors on my compiler.[/s] - [b]Answered. Thanks to SkillersDream.[/b]
D.[s] How do I make a max hit for a certain weapon, when wielded, go up?[/s] -[b]Answered. Thanks to SkillersDream. [/b] E. [s]Where can I find a BLACK party hat?[/s] - [b]Answered. Thanks to SkillersDream/McLovinScape.[/b]
F. [s]How do I make NPC drops?[/s] - [b]Answered. Thanks to SkillersDream.[/b]
G. How do I make aggressive NPC's?
[s]H. How do I make a ::master command?[/s] - [b]Answered. Thanks to SkillersDream.[/b]
I. Need to find out how to portforward without fucking my internet up.
END OF QUESTIONS.... [For now.]

item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

Answer To H.

Put This Code In Your Client.Java

        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2)
         {
   addSkillXP(14910000, 0); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 1); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 2); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 3); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 4); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 5); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 6); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 7); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 8); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 9); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 10); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 11);
   addSkillXP(14910000, 12); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 13); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 14); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 15); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 16); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 17); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 18); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 19); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 20); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 21); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 22);
   addSkillXP(14910000, 23); 
   sendMessage(" You Know Have All 99's :) "); 
}

Answe to F. If The Monster Is Exisiting with drops edit in item2.java, if not edit in npchandler and item.java

Answer To D. Go Into item.cfg and Edit The Bonus’s

For C Are You Adding The Items Into Client.java you putting them under public void NewObjects() {

hope this helped
